info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 1:21AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...CENTRAL COLUMBIANA...NORTHEASTERN CARROLL AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 121 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was located near Lisbon, or 8 miles south of Salem, moving southeast at 35 mph. Locations impacted include... East Liverpool, Wellsville, Calcutta, Lisbon, Chester, Leetonia, New Cumberland, Salineville, Newell, Hanoverton, Irondale, Stratton, Summitville, Hammondsville, Guilford Lake State Park, New Garden, La Croft, Winona, Glenmoor, and Tomlinson Run State Park. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. A quick accumulation of 1 to 2 inches is possible. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
